article_title: U.S. Rep. Rodney Davis: Congress made progress on your priorities

article_metadata.description: The 114th Congress started this year by promising to make your priorities our priorities and on day one we passed a bill inspired by a veteran from Madison County to encourage businesses to hire more of our nation’s veterans. My bill, the Hire More Heroes Act, received unanimous support on the House floor and was signed into law by President Barack Obama. We hit the ground running passing legislation to advance the people's priorities and didn’t stop.With
